desc: A session for both babies and toddlers to play.

desc: Music and movement sessions. Term time only.

name: Healthy fun time cooking
desc: After school stay and play with a focus on cooking fun for kids.

name: Tuesday Stay 'n' Play
desc: For parents and carers with children aged 0 to 5 years. These sessions are an opportunity for children to play in a fun and relaxed environment whilst giving parents and carers the opportunity to understand and gain knowledge of children's play.
venueName: Coin Street family and children's centre (Borough)

name: Sharing Stories session
desc: Share and enjoy stories in a playful way learn new skills to engage children in reading making props for books playing and exploring in messy play and cooking activities.
venueName: Coin Street family and children's centre (Borough)
bookingNararrative: By referral only by a health visitor.
capacityNarrative: By referral only by a health visitor.

name: Bumps and babies
desc: This is a dedicated session for expectant parents and parents of children under two years old focusing on exploration investigation and activities to stimulate the minds of young children. Please note we have a maximum capacity for these sessions and if we are full you may be asked to come back another week.
venueName: Coin Street family and children's centre (Borough)
